text_block_list.text: It had been a short while since I came to Tracen Academy. One day, when I was looking for an Uma Musume to train together with―

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Chomp!!
I was bitten by an Uma Musume.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: …………Kukuu ……Ha ha ha!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Wa-ha ha ha ha ha ha!! They're surprised, They're surprised～!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Wha-!? You don't know who this Windy-chan is……!? What the heck, you're quite an insolent fellow, huh!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Hmph! The one standing before you is the Evil Genius, King of Darkness, the Demon Lord of this World! Shinko Windy-chan, that's me!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Nii-shi shi shi shi!! You better remember this!
Ever since that day…… things like Jack-in-the-boxesーー

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: ……Puhuhuu.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Uhya hya hya hya hyaa-!!
And pitfall trapsーー

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Hehe……! Gyahahahahahaa-!
For some reason, Shinko Windy would play pranks on me regularly.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Ni shi shi shi-! You fell for it, you fell for it! That cream puff has horse radish in it!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Amazing huh, shaking in your boots huh, you were thunderstuck huh!? Windy-chan is overwhelming, huh!? Waaha ha ha-!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: ……wait, what's wrong? Why are you crying?

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Eh? It hurts? ……Hmph, can't be helped! Drink this. It's not carbonated, it's just regular water.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Don't worry about it! ……evil-doers always play with their prey!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: With this, you'll recover……and then Gao! Shi shi shii, that's how Windy-chan perpetrates her evil schemes!
And then one day, I went to watch a few mock races and saw Shinko Windy.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: ―…… Haa, haa, haa, haa……!
That prankster aura was nowhere to be found. Focusing ahead, with a sharp look in her eye, seriously running through the dirt.
She unflinchingly pressed forward even covered in dirt. It made me think that she would manage to pull off a victory―
……but.

text_block_list.name: Event Announcer
text_block_list.text: And now we're in the final straight, Shinko Windy presses the attack! Competing for the lead…… with 200m remaining!
She had reached the final straight, but for some reason…… rather than focusing on what's ahead, she was looking from side-to-side.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: ……Haa, haa, haa, haa!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: (……～～～, damnit! This girl, she's infront of me but I can't pull ahead!)

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: (The time before, and the one before that, and the other one before that! There's always someone in my way―― ……damnit! The footsteps and cheering are all annoying!)

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: (The crowd, nobody's looking this way!! Irritating, distracting, I can't catch up, like this, if it's like this――)

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: …… Grrrrrr～～～～! I don't want this!!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: ――Chomp!!

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Kyaa!?

text_block_list.name: Event Announcer
text_block_list.text: S-Shinko Windy!? Is Shinko Windy interfering!?

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: …………Huu, haa, haa, haa……

text_block_list.name: Event Announcer
text_block_list.text: The results of deliberation. There is no change to the finishing order. Shinko Windy will be issued a strict warning.
――The result was 2nd place. In the final straight, the girl she bit increased her speed and came in 1st place, pulling ahead by a neck.
Interference was never the answer. But, it was painfully clear that she wanted to win.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: ……Hm? Y-you're――
I had called out to her, but I was still at a loss as to what to say――

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Chomp!!
I don't know why she suddenly attacked…… with nothing to say, I ended up spending several seconds just staring at Shinko Windy―

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: ……Hehe, hehehehe……! ……they're looking, they're looking this way.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Wahahahahaha-! They were looking this wayーー!!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Fast as fast can be, you'll never catch me!
Shinko Windy ran off in high spirits, for now, I ended up chasing after her.
She ran ahead with a smile on her face…… it was a smile that made me think she was having fun.
